name: I can't believe my trip to the store with my neighbour and her weird cat so i can get soap can be this boring!
name_original: I can't believe my trip to the store with my neighbour and her weird cat so i can get soap can be this boring!
description:
In this state of the art visual novel you go on an adventure you won't forget! Unless you play a better game

Features

  1. Text: You can read it!
  2. Graphics: It has them!
  3. Sound: theres a few
  4. Music: You bet there's some of that too!
  5. Ending: It has multiple!

Made in renpy, some of the dialogue is taken from users of a public discord and i hate them for saying dumb shit like the one i put in the game.

HEAR WHAT THE CRITICS HAVE TO SAY!

"its awful"

-me

"estaba entrete re comico xd"

-a friend

Credits

Backgrounds: got them from google except for that one.

Main character and co protagonist sprites: Made by Kainco on the Lemmasoft forums

Music:

  1. Alone from Persona 4
  2. Junes Theme
  3. Hope of Autumm from Danganronpa V3
  4. Tension from Persona 5
  5. Ending from Super Mario World

Special Thanks:

Coffee

Youtube

valhallabar on discord
